resources.string: Welcome to File Share! This is an introduction to using the app. File Share lets you share files to your computer easily when your phone and your computer are connected to the same local network.
Press the \"+ Add Device\" button on your phone and your computer to pair them together. Make sure the devices are connected to the same local network.
After pairing, you can easily send files to your computer by sharing any file on your phone and finding File Share, as long as the devices are connected to the same local network.
You can remove devices by pressing and holding their name on the app.
That\'s it! You can access this introduction again anytime by pressing the question mark icon on the top-right corner of the app.
